did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Marshall Westfall Collection of Photographs #6329 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: New Work Center and Film Project
50th Anniversary of the UAW and Auto Workers Against Concessions Rally

scopecontent.p: April 5, 1987. Flint, MI. Sponsored by the Westfall Awareness Group. 35 photographs.

did.unittitle: Release of Nader Book "The Big Boys"

scopecontent.p: May 1986, Detroit Press Club. Mike Westfall contributor to book. 2 photographs.

did.unittitle: General Motors Property Tax Assessment Reduction Meeting

scopecontent.p: May 15, 1982. UAW Region 1-C Headquarters, Flint, MI. 7 photographs.
October 1981. Held in conjunction with Michigan State University. UAW Region 1-C Headquarters, Flint, MI. 5 photographs
